page.title: 20WILDEN V.A. LOWER SCHOOL.
page.content: Our school is in the middle of the village by the pub and village green. It's close to the church too. It has one very old classroom, and one very new. I started school when I was four and a bit. I started to read books when I was 5. My sister can too.I went into Mrs.Archer's class when I was nearly 7. I like it in here very much we do a lot of work. We've just finished a Bird Project. It was great. We covered all the walls with description and drawings and things. We went to the RSPB at Sandy. It was interesting there. I like swimming, music time, acting, maths and history stories. I like assembly to when we talk to God and sing. I would like to be a boxer, a singer, or a teacher when I grow up. I'm seven now. Goodbye! Love from Andrew.xxxx
